entry.title: Monday: Ice fog. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Ice fog dissipating this afternoon then mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 31.
